de.stock.environment

Class EnvironmentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stock.environment.EnvironmentHandler

  • public class EnvironmentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The environment handler holds all environments as a centralized storage for those and is the single point of contact for events to influence tradeables with influenceEnvironments(ArrayList)
    Author:
    chlange

      List of all environments

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashSet<IEnvironment> getEnvironments() 
      static EnvironmentHandler getInstance() 
      void influenceEnvironments(java.util.ArrayList<EnvironmentGroup> environmentGroups)
      Influences all tradeables linked to all environmentGroups

      If a tradeable is found more than once in a environmentGroup it gets affected only once!
      If a tradeable is found in _X_ different environment groups it gets affected _X_ times!
      void loadEnvironments()
      Loads all environments from directory Settings_Deserializer.PATH_ENVIRONMENTS and stores them in getEnvironments()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static EnvironmentHandler getInstance()

      • getEnvironments

        public java.util.HashSet<IEnvironment> getEnvironments()

      • influenceEnvironments

        public void influenceEnvironments(java.util.ArrayList<EnvironmentGroup> environmentGroups)
        Influences all tradeables linked to all environmentGroups

        If a tradeable is found more than once in a environmentGroup it gets affected only once!
        If a tradeable is found in _X_ different environment groups it gets affected _X_ times!
        Parameters:
        environmentGroups - All environmentGroups to influence

      • loadEnvironments

        public void loadEnvironments()
        Loads all environments from directory Settings_Deserializer.PATH_ENVIRONMENTS and stores them in getEnvironments()

      • register

        public boolean register(IEnvironment environment)
        Register environment at EnvironmentHandler
        Parameters:
        environment - Environment to register
        Returns:
        true if environment wasn't already registered

      • setEnvironments

        public void setEnvironments(java.util.HashSet<IEnvironment> environments)

      • updateTradeable

        private void updateTradeable(EnvironmentGroup environmentGroup,
                   ITradeable tradeable)
        Updates tradeable value with properties of environemntGroup
        Parameters:
        environmentGroup - method gets properties from this object
        tradeable - the tradeable to influence
